title: Home of the Kodavas
creator_credit: A. Bhaskar Rao, M. Bhavnani and Documentary Films of India
brief_description: Life in the little known state of Coorg in South India. The martial Kodavas, their quaint customs and simple pleasures. Coorg, nestling in a chain of hills, abounds in fertile fields and luxuriant jungles. A land of streams and rivers, including Kaveri the sacred river of the south.
